hanzi-su-wiki:
澄

Значения

Проясняться, делаться чистым; очищать, давать отстояться; напрягать слух, быть предельно внимательным; фильтровать, очистка

Мнемоника

Сливать воду 氵, которая поднялась 登 в процессе варки бобов.

Варианты

澂
purpleculture_pinyin:
chéng
surname Cheng; clear; limpid; to clarify; to purify
фамилия Ченг; Чисто; прозрачный; уточнить; очищать

dèng
(of liquid) to settle; to become clear
(жидкости) осесть; стать ясным
rtega_mnemonic:
澄澄RSclear, pure, purify water by allowing sediment to settle
  • pure water 氵 rises 登 to the top when sediment is left to settle to the bottom
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 登 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
澄清 [ chéng qīng ]: clear (of liquid); limpid; to clarify; to make sth clear; to be clear (about the facts)
澄澈 [ chéng chè ]: limpid; crystal clear
清澄 [ qīng chéng ]: limpid
澄城 [ chéng chéng ]: Chengcheng County in Weinan 渭南 , Shaanxi
澄城县 [ chéng chéng xiàn ]: Chengcheng County in Weinan 渭南 , Shaanxi
澄清 [ dèng qīng ]: to settle (of liquid); to become clear (by precipitation of impurities); precipitate (chemistry); to put in order; to quell disturbances
黄澄澄 [ huáng dèng dèng ]: glistening yellow
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 登 [ dēng ] to rise, to mount, to board, to climb
heisig_chinese_memo: Scuba divers know that as you ascend in the water, the lucidity of the water improves and becomes more transparent.
heisig_constituent: lucidity, water, water droplets, water pistol, ascend, teepee, wigwam, beans, table, one, mouth
Keyword_KANJIDIC: lucidity, be clear, clear, clarify, settle, strain, look grave
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: Ясность, ясно, ясно, уточнить, отстояться, процедить, смотреть могилу
koohiiStory1: Scuba divers know that when you ascend in the water, your lucidity increases (For non-divers, the deeper you go, the more you become mentally impaired by nitrogen narcosis, every 50 feet is like drinking one martini). Scuba divers also know that as you ascend in the water, the lucidity of the water improves, too.
koohiiStory2: A few drops of acid/peyote and the Indians obtain lucidity on their vision quest, as if they were floating in the lucid sky.
jp_example_words:
澄ます(すます): to clear, to make clear, to be unruffled, to look unconcerned, to look demure, look prim, put on airs
澄む(すむ): to clear (e.g. weather), to become transparent
jp_readingExamples: 澄ます (す.ます), 澄む (す.む)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: When the tsunami struck, it hit your tent full of beans. When you lost your tent of beans, you had a moment of lucidity. You don't need so much stuff, you can live without it!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Then you went back to being crazy. That moment of lucidity was only temporary, and you go back to stockpiling beans.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your lucidity was caused by none other than Mrs. Chou (ちょう), though. After the tsunami wiped away your beans tent, you went crazy. Then, she came and slapped you in the face for being loud, making you lucid (for a bit).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: It's strange that Mrs. Chou would be the source of lucidity, but that's what she did just there. Of course, it was probably for selfish reasons, knowing her.
Ru_Meaning: lucidity, be clear, clear, clarify, settle, strain, look grave
Ru_Radicals: 并, 口 (рот), 汁 (суп), 癶 (крыша с точками), 豆 (боб)
Ru_trainchinese:
dèng: (глаг) (о жидкости) отстаиваться, становиться чистым; выливать жидкость (но оставлять осадок в емкости)
chéng: (прил/глаг) прозрачный, ясный (о воде); прояснять
Kanshudo_mnemonic: as you climb (登) the water (氵) becomes clear
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Scuba divers know that as you ascend in the water, the lucidity of the water improves and becomes more transparent.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " water " and " boarding ", the original meaning is that the water is clear and still. " Cheng " with " Cheng ", "said the text": "clear also from the water, the sound of the provincial levy.." "Huainanzi ‧ spiritual training": "Meat condensate without food, without drink wine Cheng."

" Cheng " can mean still. "Guan Zi‧ Light and Heavy B": "Tune is clear, and clear is constant." Guo Moruo and others set the school: "The clear one is still."

" Cheng " also means clarity. Han Xu Qian's "Zhong Lun: Condemnation of Diplomacy": "Therefore, there is no matter of friendship, no request for help, calm mind and body, and contentment."

" Cheng " also means to clarify and make clear. "The Book of the Later Han·Feng Yan Chuan 2": "The tomb of Chengdehua is late, and the punishment is steep; the magic of the burnt Shang Yang, the burning of Han Fei." Li Xian's note: "Cheng is still clear."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and " deng ", the original meaning is that water is clear and still.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「登」聲，本義為水清而靜止。「澄」同「澂」，《說文》：「清也。从水，徵省聲。」《淮南子‧精神訓》：「肉凝而不食，酒澄而不飲。」

　　「澄」可表示靜止。《管子‧輕重乙》：「調則澄，澄則常。」郭沫若等集校：「澄者，靜止也。」

　　「澄」也表示明凈。漢徐幹《中論‧譴交》：「故無交游之事，無請託之端，心澄體靜，恬然自得。」

　　「澄」還表示澄清、使清明。《後漢書‧馮衍傳下》：「澄德化之陵遲兮，烈刑罰之峭峻；燔商鞅之法術兮，燒韓非之說論。」李賢注：「澄猶清也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「登」聲，本義為水清而靜止。

從「 水 」，「 登 」聲，本義為水清而靜止。「 澄 」同「 澂 」，《說文》：「清也。从水，徵省聲。」《淮南子‧精神訓》：「肉凝而不食，酒澄而不飲。」 「 澄 」可表示靜止。《管子‧輕重乙》：「調則澄，澄則常。」郭沫若等集校：「澄者，靜止也。」 「 澄 」也表示明凈。漢徐幹《中論‧譴交》：「故無交游之事，無請託之端，心澄體靜，恬然自得。」 「 澄 」還表示澄清、使清明。《後漢書‧馮衍傳下》：「澄德化之陵遲兮，烈刑罰之峭峻；燔商鞅之法術兮，燒韓非之說論。」李賢注：「澄猶清也。」

" Cheng" with " Cheng", "said the text": "clear also from the water, the sound of the provincial levy.." "Huainanzi ‧ spiritual training": "Meat condensate without food, without drink wine Cheng." " Cheng" can mean still. "Guan Zi‧ Light and Heavy B": "Tune is clear, and clear is constant." Guo Moruo and others set the school: "The clear one is still." " Cheng" also means clarity. Han Xu Qian's "Zhong Lun: Condemnation of Diplomacy": "Therefore, there is no matter of friendship, no request for help, calm mind and body, and contentment." "The Book of the Later Han·Feng Yan Chuan 2": "The tomb of Chengdehua is late, and the punishment is steep; the magic of the burnt Shang Yang, the burning of Han Fei." 澄字的基本解释

澄
chéng
水静而清：澄莹。澄酒（淡酒）。澄汰。澄澈。澄湛。澄廓。澄清。澄碧。澄净。澄静。澄明。

澄
dèng
让液体里的杂质沉下去：澄清。澄沙。澄泥浆。

澄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chéng］
［《廣韻》直陵切，平蒸，澄。］
［《廣韻》直庚切，平庚，澄。］
亦作“浧2”。“澂1”的今字。亦作“瀓1”。
(1)清澈而不流动。
(2)明净。
(3)澄清，使清明。
(4)静止。
(5)安，安定。
[②]［dèng］
［《集韻》唐亘切，去隥，定。］
(1)使液体中的杂质沉淀。
(2)滤。

澄字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　澄； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页651第24
〔古文〕浧【集韻】持陵切，音懲。【增韻】水靜而淸也。【謝靈運詩】秋水共澄鮮。　又【曹植詩】明月澄淸景。【註】澄，湛也。　又酒名。【禮·禮運】澄酒在下。　又山名。【廣輿記】在南昌豐城縣。　又【集韻】除庚切，音棖。又直拯切，懲上聲。又澄應切，音瞪。義?同。　又【集韻】唐亙切，音鄧。淸濁分也。

澄字的源字形

澄字的起名意思

：1、静，宁静，如澄宁，清静安定；2、如澄明，澄澈明洁。3、动词，靖，安定。

["Guangyun" cut straight tombs, steamed flat, and clear. ]

Also known as "浧2". The present character of "澂1". Also known as "瀓1".
(1) Clear and not flowing.
(2) Mingjing.
(3) Clarify and make clear.
(4) Still.
(5) Security, stability.
[②]［dèng］
["Ji Yun" Tang Qianqie, go to 隥, set. ]
(1) Precipitating impurities in the liquid.
(2) Filter.

Кай
chéng, dèng
I chéng
1) зеркальный (о водной поверхности); хрустально-чистый, ясный, прозрачный
澄秋 ясная осень
2) чистый, очищенный; фильтрованный
澄酒 очищенное вино
3) делать спокойным; делать ясным
II dèng
отстаивать, очищать, фильтровать; отстаиваться
澄水 очищать (фильтровать) воду
Radicals: 氵, 癶, 豆  (tsunami, tent, beans)
Meaning Mnemonic
When the tsunami struck, it hit your tent full of beans. When you lost your tent of beans, you had a moment of lucidity. You don't need so much stuff, you can live without it!
Then you went back to being crazy. That moment of lucidity was only temporary, and you go back to stockpiling beans.
Reading Mnemonic
Your lucidity was caused by none other than Mrs. Chou (ちょう), though. After the tsunami wiped away your beans tent, you went crazy. Then, she came and slapped you in the face for being loud, making you lucid (for a bit).
It's strange that Mrs. Chou would be the source of lucidity, but that's what she did just there. Of course, it was probably for selfish reasons, knowing her.
